## Risk Level / مستوى المخاطر
- **Risk Level:** L0 / L1 / L2 / L3
  **مستوى المخاطر:** L0 / L1 / L2 / L3

| Level | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| L0 | Safe (docs, formatting) |
| L1 | Normal (features, non-sensitive) |
| L2 | Sensitive (governance, CI, security) |
| L3 | Critical (auth, payments, secrets) |
